testsuite.name: login.LoginUsernameFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Username field Placeholder text in the Login screen" Username* text is displayed in the Username placeholder TC_loginUsernamePlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "dmm" in the Username field Performed click action on Login button field Username must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "ZKGD" in the Username field Performed click action on Login button field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the username text field TC_loginUsernameAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "YzQQrHQiCWTpxnUU" in the Username field Performed click action on Login button field Username must be less than 16 characters error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Username text field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Login screen Username field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "[=)-$" in the Username field Performed click action on Login button field Special characters are allowed in the username text field TC_loginUsernameSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_loginUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Username in the Login screen" Performed click action on Username field Entered text "" in the Username field Performed click action on Login button field Required error message is displayed TC_loginUsernameEmpty Testcase execution Completed
